title: Land not offered in GAME_SELECT choices despite land_drops_used: 0
description:
In game_20260214_115320_g2, Gem25F Johnny had Ancient Tomb (p9) in hand with land_drops_used: 0, but the GAME_SELECT choices only listed castable spells (Fury p2, Chalice of the Void p6). The land was never offered across ~15 get_action_choices calls, trapping the model in an unwinnable loop where it kept trying choose_action(id="p9") and getting "Object p9 not found in current choices".

Earlier in the same game, Mountain (p4) WAS listed as action: "land" among the choices, so this is inconsistent. Possibly a timing issue with when XMage offers land plays vs spell plays in the same GAME_SELECT prompt, or the MCP layer filtering it out.

Needs investigation of the bridge logs to see what XMage actually offered vs what the MCP layer translated.
